name: Мику
info:
• 简体中文名: 未来
  • 别名: Miku
  • 性别: 女
detail: Miku is Japanese and has long cyan hair in two ponytails. She can often be found in the music room. She is very bad at communicating in sentences that actually make much sense, and often ends up spewing out more than the main character can chew. She often makes obscure references based on the situation at hand, and doesn't not seem to be the brightest of the bunch. Yet, she shows talent in music and always seem to keep her head held high. Her unique story can be unlocked.
